item.title: 停火缓解经济压力，以色列重回债券市场
item.description: 周二，以色列重新进入全球债券市场，开始了一笔美元交易，因为它希望在经历了 16 个多月的战争后增强其资产负债表。【原文：Israel re-entered the global bond market on Tuesday, starting a dollar deal as it looks to bolster its balance sheet after more than 16 months of war.】

item.title: Spotify 创始人卖出蓬勃发展的科技股获利 10 亿美元
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 的创始人最近通过出售这家音频流媒体巨头的股票赚取了约 10 亿美元，他们在公司之外的投资也在不断增加。【原文：Spotify Technology SA’s founders recently pocketed about $1 billion from selling the audio-streaming giant’s stock as they increasingly build up investments outside the company.】

item.title: 华利安聘用前巴克莱银行行员担任亚洲区高级职务
item.description: 全球金融顾问公司华利安公司（Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Global financial adviser Houlihan Lokey Inc. has hired Angela Hu as managing director in the firm’s financial sponsors team, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 前红杉印度公司削减基金费用后失去两名合伙人
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在红杉资本削减其最新的增长基金并削减其他基金的费用数月后，红杉资本的前隶属公司 Peak XV Partners 将失去两名合伙人。【原文：Peak XV Partners, formerly part of Sequoia Capital, is losing two of its partners, according to people familiar with the matter, months after the firm reduced its latest growth fund and cut fees on others.】

item.title: 制裁余波未平，中国将获得更便宜的俄罗斯石油
item.description: 由于对美国制裁的担忧与日俱增，增加了物流和行政方面的障碍，使买家望而却步，中国炼油厂正以较低的价格获得俄罗斯ESPO原油货物。【原文：Chinese refiners are being offered Russian ESPO crude cargoes at lower prices as growing concern around US sanctions increase logistical and administrative hurdles, putting off buyers.】

item.title: 汇丰聘请前法国巴黎银行家孙为亚洲债务市场主管
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）聘请前法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）银行家孙治勋（George Sun）担任亚洲区全球债务市场主管，在该行进行重组之际吸引了一位外部人士。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc hired former BNP Paribas SA banker George Sun as head of global debt markets for Asia, attracting an outsider even as the bank undergoes a restructuring.】

item.title: 欧盟表示将对美国关税采取反制措施
item.description: 欧盟表示，它将对美国可能对其征收的任何关税做出回应，从而使潜在的跨大西洋贸易争端升级。【原文：The European Union said it will respond to any tariffs the US might impose on it, escalating a potential transatlantic trade dispute.】

item.title: 越南盾兑美元汇率跌至历史新低
item.description: 在越南中央银行连续第六天调低汇率后，越南货币兑美元汇率跌至历史新低。【原文：Vietnam’s currency fell to a record low against the dollar after the central bank set the fixing lower for a sixth consecutive day.】

item.title: 菲律宾镍矿石产量因印尼需求而上升
item.description: 据一个行业组织的负责人称，在印尼需求增加和第一大市场中国需求稳定的支持下，菲律宾的镍矿石产量今年有望恢复。【原文：The Philippines’ nickel ore output is expected to recover this year, supported by increased appetite from Indonesia and steady demand from top market China, according to the head of an industry group.】

item.title: Robinhood 在英国推出期权交易，ISA 也即将推出
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司周二将面向英国客户推出美国股票期权交易，这家投资公司希望尽快将业务扩展到英国的免税账户。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is launching US equity options trading for UK customers on Tuesday, as the investment firm looks to expand into tax-free accounts in Britain soon.】

item.title: EQT 启动面向富裕个人投资者的基础设施基金
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的私募股权公司 EQT AB 正在推出一项新战略，让私人财富客户能够获得其基础设施投资，从而在该行业深耕零售市场之际扩大其投资者基础。【原文：Sweden-based private equity firm EQT AB is launching a new strategy for private wealth clients to access its infrastructure investments, broadening its investor base at a time when the industry is plowing into retail markets.】

item.title: 为什么中国无法解决房地产市场的混乱局面？
item.description: 中国房地产市场曾经是中国经济增长的最大动力之一，但五年来，中国房地产市场一直处于螺旋式下滑的状态，而且没有丝毫减弱的迹象。房地产价值持续暴跌，陷入经济困境的家庭被迫出售房产，在投机项目上背负巨额债务的公寓开发商濒临倒闭。【原文：Once one of the country’s biggest growth drivers, China’s property market has been in a downward spiral for five years with no signs of abating. Real estate values continue to plummet, households in financial distress are being forced to sell properties, and apartment developers that have racked up enormous debt on speculative projects are on the brink of collapse.】

item.title: 中国股市吸引对冲基金和富达基金看涨
item.description: 随着中国技术实力的不断增强以及对进一步刺激政策的预期有助于重燃乐观情绪，中国股市重新受到全球投资者的青睐。【原文：Chinese stocks are coming back into favor among global investors as the nation’s growing technological heft and expectations for additional stimulus help rekindle optimism.】

item.title: 匈牙利通货膨胀飙升，欧尔班面临政治问题
item.description: 匈牙利通胀加速的速度远超预期，这考验着央行的鹰派立场，也成为总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）在大选前面临的一个政治问题。【原文：Hungarian inflation accelerated far more quickly than expected, testing the central bank’s hawkish pivot and morphing into a pre-election political problem for Prime Minister Viktor Orban.】

item.title: 挪威国内生产总值意外收缩支持宽松计划
item.description: 挪威上一季度的经济出现了自大流行病以来最大的萎缩，这给央行启动期待已久的宽松政策增加了压力。【原文：Norway’s economy surprised last quarter with the biggest contraction since the pandemic, adding pressure on the central bank to start its long-awaited easing campaign.】

item.title: Entain 首席执行官从博彩公司离职，立即生效
item.description: 英国体育博彩公司 Entain Plc 的首席执行官加文-艾萨克斯（Gavin Isaacs）在上任不到 6 个月后立即卸任。【原文：British sports betting company Entain Plc’s Chief Executive Officer Gavin Isaacs has stepped down with immediate effect after less than six months in the role.】

item.title: 美国接管空无一人的加沙？特朗普的提议为何令人震惊
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说得合情合理、直截了当。特朗普在 2 月 4 日首次表示，美国作为地球上最强大的国家，将在一年半的破坏性战争后接管加沙地带，拆除受损建筑和未爆弹药，并重建该地区。他说，与此同时，邻国应接纳加沙人，让他们过上 "美好 "的生活，让他们不想再回去。【原文：President Donald Trump made it sound logical and straightforward. The US, the most powerful country on Earth, would take over the Gaza Strip after a year and a half of devastating war, remove its damaged buildings and unexploded ordnance, and rebuild the place, Trump said for the first time on Feb. 4. Meanwhile, he said, Gazans should be taken in by neighboring countries and given access to lives so “beautiful” they wouldn’t want to return.】

item.title: 英国石油公司承诺在埃利奥特干预后 "重启 "战略
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）在报告利润急剧下降后，承诺在即将发布的战略更新中进行重大变革，公司正努力扭转长期业绩不佳的局面，目前已吸引了激进的埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）。【原文：BP Plc pledged major changes at its upcoming strategy update after reporting a sharp drop in profit, as the company seeks to reverse a prolonged period of under-performance that has now drawn in activist Elliott Investment Management.】

item.title: 据说土耳其在交易需求不一后将考虑放缓 IPO
item.description: 据一位熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，土耳其正在考虑放慢在伊斯坦布尔主要证券交易所首次公开发行股票的步伐，因为投资者对近期一系列交易的需求喜忧参半。【原文：Turkey is considering slowing down the pace of initial public offerings on Istanbul’s main bourse, according to a person familiar with the discussions, following mixed investor demand for a spate of recent deals.】

item.title: 南非放宽 1.08 亿美元以下国家交易规则
item.description: 南非颁布了对公共金融法的修改，这将减少政府与私营企业合作的价值低于 20 亿兰特（1.08 亿美元）的项目的繁文缛节。【原文：South Africa enacted changes to its public-finance laws that will reduce the red tape for projects valued at less than 2 billion rand ($108 million) where the government partners with private businesses.】

item.title: 组织称南非反腐败工作停滞不前
item.description: 据倡导组织 "腐败观察"（Corruption Watch）称，南非当局打击腐败的努力似乎停滞不前，在一项衡量人们对腐败看法的指数上，南非仍低于全球平均水平。【原文：Efforts by the South African authorities to combat corruption appear to have stagnated and the country remains below the global average on an index that measures perceptions of graft, according to advocacy group Corruption Watch.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市再创新高后将下挫
法国失业率下降缓解对经济前景的担忧
item.description: 2024 年底，法国失业率出人意料地下降，这显示出这个饱受政治不稳定和债务增加困扰的国家的经济韧性。【原文：French unemployment unexpectedly declined at the end of 2024, showing signs of economic resilience in a country wrestling with political instability and rising debt.】

item.title: 汇丰银行违反韩国卖空规则的指控不成立
item.description: 韩国法院宣判汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）非法卖空的指控不成立，这对韩国政府遏制股票交易滥用的努力是一个打击。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc was acquitted by a South Korean court of charges that the bank engaged in illegal short-selling, a blow to the government’s efforts to rein in abuses in the stock trading practice.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克斯称美欧谈判可缓解关税打击
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克呼吁欧盟与美国就贸易问题举行会谈。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks called for talks between the European Union and the US on trade.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行提高投资者回报率，首席执行官奥塞尔寻求交易
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）公布的第四季度利润超过了分析师的预期，这使得该银行在首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 在意大利和德国寻求收购的同时，仍能提高股东回报。【原文：UniCredit SpA reported a fourth-quarter profit that beat analyst estimates, allowing the bank to boost shareholder returns even as Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel pursues takeovers in Italy and Germany.】

item.title: 据说 GDS 考虑在 2025 年将前中国部门 GDSI 在美国上市，筹资 5 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，GDS 控股有限公司正在考虑对其 GDS 国际业务进行美国首次公开募股，以筹集约 5 亿美元资金。【原文：GDS Holdings Ltd. is considering a US initial public offering of its GDS International business to raise about $500 million, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 中国计划开行 "银发列车 "鼓励老年潮一代外出旅游
item.description: 作为打造 "银发经济 "和释放老龄人口消费能力的努力的一部分，中国计划推出配备医疗和老年护理设施的旅游列车网络。【原文：China plans to roll out a network of tourist trains equipped with medical and elder-care facilities as part of its efforts to create a “silver economy” and unlock the spending power of its aging population.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 Neom 公司签订 50 亿美元人工智能数据中心协议
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正在红海沿岸开发的特大城市 Neom 获得了一家当地公司 50 亿美元的投资，用于建立一个人工智能数据中心。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Neom, the megacity being developed on the Red Sea coast, secured a $5 billion investment from a local firm to establish an AI data center.】

item.title: 澳大利亚工商会（ACCI）称，澳大利亚在任何中美对峙中都必须谨慎行事
item.description: 澳大利亚商会和协会负责人表示，在世界两大经济体对峙之际，澳大利亚需要谨慎处理与其最大贸易伙伴中国以及头号投资者和重要盟友美国之间的关系。【原文：Australia needs to carefully manage ties with its biggest trading partner, China, and No. 1 investor and key ally, the US, as the world’s two largest economies face off, the head of the Australian Chamber of Commerce and Institute said.】
